short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simple solution for growing your social media accounts virally

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates the posting of high quality content on your social sites using ChatGPT. The content is absolutely amazing and will drive TONS of followers and traffic to any offer or business you want traffic.
 
The tool does not need any of your account information or anything about you. All actions are processed in the background. 
 
FEATURES
With the PostEASE, you can:
▪️ Post amazing content daily
▪️ Attract the right audience, inspired by your amazing content
▪️ Customize your content based on your niche and favorite influencer
▪️ Content is text, motivational quotes, images, reels and video 
▪️ Nothing else like this tool, it is a one of a kind
................................................................................................................
 
FAQs
▪️ Is this extension safe to use? 
Yes, we have tested this extension over multiple accounts to find the most optimal request times so that your account remains 100% safe. 
 
▪️ Does this work with fresh accounts?
Yes, it does not matter how old your accounts are. 
 
▪️ What are the best practices for using this tool?
It is literally set it and forget it. The content is posted at optimal times of the day for each social account. 
 
▪️ Do you require my account login information? 
No, we do not require your social login & password. We do not have any access to your account. You just need to leave these accounts logged in on your browser window. 
 
▪️ How can I stop using the PostEASE extension? 
You can simply click the "Active" button at the top of the PostEASE extension to turn it off. When you do so, it turns gray which is off completely. 
 
▪️ Can I use the system while the extension is running in the background? 
Yes, you can switch the tab and work as usual. Just do not close your web browser and be sure you are logged into your social accounts.
 
▪️ How do you charge for the use of the extension? 
The PostEASE extension is billed on a monthly, annual and lifetime basis.
